group_1.textRight: You can say that again.

group_1.textLeft: Want to swing by the café near the station on@the way home?

group_1.textRight: Sounds good! I've been craving something sweet.

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah, do you want to come with us, Sakuya?

group_1.textRight: [chara:302101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]S-sorry! What's up?

group_1.textLeft: We're going to a café in a bit, and we were@wondering if you'd like to join us.

group_1.textRight: ...I...have plans already...
Mm, see you later!

group_1.textLeft: Did Sakuya seem a little off to you?

group_1.textRight: Yeah... I wonder if something happened?

group_1.textCenter: (Oh jeez, this isn't good! I keep spacing out...)
(I hope they don't think anything suspicious is@going on...)

group_1.textRight: Sakuyaaa!

group_1.textLeft: Huh? I thought you were going to the café with@the others?

group_1.textRight: I am!
But I wanted to talk to you before I left.
I've been thinking about you a lot these last few@days...
I watch you run now and then,
To get an idea of how you do it.
When I first saw you, I thought, "This new girl@is amazing!"
So I've always liked seeing how you run so I can@improve my own form.
Lately, you've been tipping your head back when@you're finished running, right?
You didn't do that when you first joined the team,
So I was kind of concerned...

group_1.textLeft: I've been in a bit of a slump lately, is all...

group_1.textRight: I see...

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry! I'll be back to my old self in no time!

group_1.textRight: That's good to hear...
Once you're feeling better, please give me tips@on my form!

group_1.textLeft: Thanks, will do. See you tomorrow.

group_1.textRight: Okay! Have a good evening!

group_1.textCenter: (What am I doing, lying to my junior...)
(Though I guess there's no point in telling her@the truth, is there?)

group_1.narration: I'm worried that I won't be able@to run for real anymore...

group_1.textCenter: (I'm a Magical Girl, so if I gave it my all when@I ran,)
(I'd probably set an unbelievable new record...)
(It's hard to only be able to put in half of my@usual effort...)
Oh no! Is it that time already?!
If I don't hurry up, the Eldest Sister is going to@be so mad at me!
